title: Looking for this font.....
content:
Friend wants to have this embroidered but doesn't know the font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134010im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5975.jpg)

Font: 

 Janie HMK 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134010/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134010/http:/typophile.com/files/font_388.jpg) | 68.04 KB |
author: wannab1

comments.content:
The font is called **Janie HMK** by Hallmark Design Collection (your sample is a bit back-slanted).  
You can see a sample here:  
 [http://www.dasauge.co.uk/fonts/janie-hmk/?system=0&staerke=7](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134010/http:/www.dasauge.co.uk/fonts/janie-hmk/?system=0&staerke=7 "http://www.dasauge.co.uk/fonts/janie-hmk/?system=0&staerke=7")  
I can't find any legitimate site to acquire it (although Linotype offered this font in the past).
